text: Judith Ellen Light (February 9 1949 in Trenton, New Jersey) is an American stage and television actress who has been featured in multiple soap operas and sitcoms. She acted in sitcoms such as Who's the Boss?, Ugly Betty and Law & Order: Special Victims Unit. category:American television actors Category:1949 births Category:Living people Category:Actors from Trenton, New Jersey Category:Soap opera actors
title: Judith Light
